Caner Derici, Ph.D.

Hi! I’m Caner Derici. I’m a software engineer, Ph.D. in computer science, homelabber, content creator, biker, and guitarist.

I specialize in compilers & programming languages, with industry experience in distributed systems at Canonical (Juju, Go, Python). I received my Ph.D. from Indiana University. My dissertation is titled “Self-Hosting Functional Programming Languages on Meta-Tracing JIT Compilers.”

Check out: Professional, HomeLab, Building a Community, Bike, Music, Artsy, Travel, and Arch.

© 2025 Caner Derici, Ph.D. — Sandy, UT, USA
